message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
I'm interested in the product, but $14000 is a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
